alert.note: Alert for Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 01 at 3:34PM PDT until September 02 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY ARE EXPECTED FRIDAY AFTERNOON AND EVENING... ...DRY AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS ALSO EXPECTED FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE OR611... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 611 Deschutes National Forest -minus Sisters Ranger District. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...An increase in fire weather spread and activity will be possible as winds increase associated with a passing upper level shortwave.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Deschutes National Forest - minus Sisters Ranger District
